column1: #text=If you want to plant a tree it is best to get a small sapling .
#text=Dig yourself a hole and put the saplings root ball in the hole .
#text=You do not want to cut or break the roots when you put it in the ground .
#text=Make sure your hole is big enough but not too deep .
#text=You also do not want your hole to be too narrow .
#text=You can remove any dead or dried up roots from the ball .
#text=You now want to refill with dirt lightly tamping the dirt as you go .
#text=Make a mound of dirt around the base of the tree with the dirt that no longer fits in the hole .
#text=It is a good idea to also add some sort of mulch to protect the dirt from washing away .
#text=This will also help keep weeds from growing and help in keeping moisture to roots .
#text=Fertilize and water your newly planted tree .
